abstract: Amazon bumps knees with New York literary agents.
snippet: Amazon bumps knees with New York literary agents.
lead_paragraph: On Monday, news came that Amazon, the behemoth of the book industry, was bumping knees with book agents. According to Matthew Flamm at Crain’s New York Business, the online retailer flew a dozen of New York’s top literary agents out to its headquarters in Seattle for a friendly chat and to suggest that its aggressive discounting of books and sales of e-books is designed to help the business of publishing, not destroy it.

headline.main: Amazon and Agents: Friendly Chat or Workaround
